column4: Hi everyone. I downloaded and installed the look which can be seen in this picture: http://lastopp.no/filer2/75c0b5028eaa3f18cc9548b1fd14b563.JPG . I can't remember what it's called and therefore I can't search for help on how to uninstalling it. Can anyone help?
/usr/share/themes try to remove the theme and reboot and see whats happends, it will use the default theme then
